description.narrative: To improve core urban functions in an equitable and resource efficient manner by removing identified infrastructure bottlenecks hampering land development, transport, and environmental conditions in four second-tier cities in Sichuan Province.

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: From 2007, Mianyang and Suining each to submit a annual plan and annual report on long-term investments for constructioninvestments amd public services in the three Economic Development Zones
From 2008, Four project cities each to submit to the Bank a plan for operation and maintenance (including budget) ofinfrastructureconstructed under the Project
Implementation of EMP, RAP and the cost of implementation, cost of public investments, process of auction, price negotiation andallocation of land are to be monoitored and reported to the Bank
In development of the 3 economic development zones, Mianyang and Suining will sell/transfer land through auction, negotiated priceand allocation in accordance with domestic laws and regulations
MIANYANG AND SUINING EACH TO FURNISH A LONG TERM INVESTMENT PLAN FOR 2007-2013 (INCLUDING BUDGET) FOR CONSTRUCTION INVESTMENTS AND
Mianyang will complete the award of contract for constructing the municipal section of Second Ring Road (2RR) before the award ofcontract for constructing the project section of 2RR.
Mianyang will furnish to the Bank an EA, EMP, and RAP for the municipal section of 2RR.
PWAC to produce total revenues equivalent to not less than 1.3 times the sum of operating expenses and the amount by which deptservice requirements exceed the provision for depriciations (after CY09)
PWAC will produce total revenues equivalent to not less than the sum of its total operating expenses and the amount by which debtservice requirements exceed the provision for depreciations after CY07
Panzhihua and Panzhihua Water Affair Company (PWAC) complete the contract for constructing the Qingxiangping WWTP before the awardof contract for constructing the wastewater collection systems
Sichuan to prepare and submit to the Bank a mid-term report
Sichuan with the Bank to review the mid-term report
Various responsible agencies and project companies will implement the EA, EMP and RAP when they carry out the project activitiesorlinked activities
